rComments: Heavy but manageable workload for a C1 core class.. She grades (at least for this class) on improvement. I put little effort in my essays initially but tried super hard on my last one (along with revising all 5 essays) and got an A. You don't have to do all the reading, or understand all of it, but if you do it makes essay writing so much easier

Avoid taking Porter core with Athens. Take anyone else! She makes going to class such a drag and will ruin your day. Her work is excessive compared to other core professors. STAY AWAY. Had a horrible, stressful quarter because of her

Athens sucks the fun out of taking Porter Core and being able to write and learn about art. I advise looking into ANY other professor who teaches this class. She assigns a copious amount of work compared to the other core teachers and then sends weekly emails over the weekend giving you more work just to ruin Sunday.
